titleStmt.title: The Address of above twenty thousand of the loyal Protestant apprentices of London humbly presented to the right honourable the Lord Mayor, Septemb. 2, 1681 ...
titleStmt.author: Ward, Patience, Sir, 1629-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Sir Patience Ward served as Lord Mayor of London.
"In commemoration of the burning of a famous Protestant city by papists."
